function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread and impact of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Economic decline, high uncertainty, uneven economic recovery, significant challenges in public health and other various areas","Mitigation":"Strict public health measures, rapid vaccine distribution, international collaboration and communication","Technologies":"Vaccine development, contact tracing apps, remote work and education technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, essential workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Highly infectious nature, extended incubation period, difficulty in detection, vagueness in transmission modes","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to public health guidelines, vaccination campaigns, testing and surveillance programs","Technologies":"PCR testing, rapid antigen tests, vaccine development, air filtration systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, essential workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, healthcare organizations"}]}
